Docs.summary: Colors and Patterns as used in MonoTouch.UIKit.

remarks.para: Basic representation for colors in UIKit. UIColors can be created from various color representations as well as encoding an alpha transparency channel. In addition to solid or transparent colors, it is possible to create a UIColor instance from an image, and use the resulting UIColor as a brush whenever a UIKit UIColor is used.
